snippet: The social media missives directed to Gov. Mike Pence have been frequent, pointed and unyielding in their descriptions of female physiology.
abstract: Social media campaign has targeted Indiana Gov Mike Pence with disconcertingly scathing messages related to his signing of law placing new restrictions on abortion in state; protestors have drawn national attention to law, which is among country's most prohibitive.
lead_paragraph: The social media missives directed to Gov. Mike Pence have been frequent, pointed and unyielding in their descriptions of female physiology.

headline.main: ‘Periods for Pence’ Campaign Targets Indiana Governor Over Abortion Law
headline.print_headline: Women Irked by Abortion Law Make Governor the Butt of Social Media Ridicule
